content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line at Position (-20, -70)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) and (-18.0, -70.0)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) supplying coal
- Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5) storing coal
- Transport Belt connecting the mining drill to the furnaces

### Copper Ore Collection at Position (-23.5, -69.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-23.5, -69.5) storing copper ore
- Transport Belts connecting the mining drill to the chest

### Iron Ore Collection at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) moving items from chest to belt
- Transport Belt connecting the chest to other structures

### Iron Plate Storage at Position (-16.5, -64.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) moving items from furnace to chest
- Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) storing iron plates

### Miscellaneous Storage
- Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) storing coal, iron ore, and iron plates
- Wooden Chest at position (3.5, 0.5) empty

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors with Empty Belts
- Ensure that resources are being placed onto belts to avoid empty belt warnings.

### Errors with Furnaces Lacking Ingredients
- Ensure that furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt by checking the input logistics.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Verify that inserters have access to source items and are positioned correctly to pick up items.

### Errors with Mining Drills Running Out of Fuel
- Regularly refuel mining drills to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors with Chest Inventory Management
- Monitor chest inventories to prevent overflow or underflow, ensuring efficient resource management.
